original: Andersson, Oskar Rune, redaktör, Falkenberg, f. 13/10/15 i Rolfstorp, Hallands 1. G. 43 m. Vega Färdig. — Medarb. i Norra Hallands Tidn. Vestkusten, Varberg, 34-37, medarb., tidvis nattred. i Härnösands-Posten m. Sollefteå-Bladet, Härnösand, 37-41, medarb. i Örnsköldsviks-Posten, Örnsköldsvik, 41-43, i Kristianstads Läns Tidn. 43-45, notischef i Hallands Ny- heter, Falkenberg, sed. 45. Sekr. i Ängermanl. idr :förb. 38-39, i Anger-manl. ishockeysekt. 38-39. Skr.: Nebulösa (diktsaml. 34), Tång (dikt-saml. 35).
translated: Andersson, Oskar Rune, editor, Falkenberg, born October 13, 1915 in Rolfstorp, Halland. Married in 1943 to Vega Färdig. - Worked as a contributor to Norra Hallands Tidning and Vestkusten in Varberg from 1934 to 1937, as a part-time night editor for Härnösands-Posten and Sollefteå-Bladet in Härnösand from 1937 to 1941, as a contributor to Örnsköldsviks-Posten in Örnsköldsvik from 1941 to 1943, and as a contributor to Kristianstads Läns Tidning from 1943 to 1945. Currently the news editor at Hallands Nyheter in Falkenberg since 1945. Secretary for Ängermanland Sports Association from 1938 to 1939, and for the ice hockey section of Ängermanland Sports Association from 1938 to 1939. Author of Nebulösa (poetry collection, 1934) and Tång (poetry collection, 1935).
